definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance

sentences.english: So I wanted to travel to Hong Kang.
Now let's have a deeper understanding of this great astronomer.
sentences.chinese: 現在，就讓我們來認識一下落下閎。

sentences.english: Hong Taiji then proceeded in 1636 to invade Korea for the second time.
sentences.chinese: 閎臺飢接着在1636年入侵朝鮮進行了第二次。

sentences.english: This is John from Hong Guan Machinery Co. , LTD.
sentences.chinese: 這是約翰從閎估岸機械有限公司。

definition: (archaic) to present/to bequeath/variant of 貽|贻[yi2]
black horse/jet steed/good horse/legendary black dragon
